resources.string: Term of Service and Privacy Policy
Place a barcode inside the viewfinder rectangle to scan it.
Share Your Referral Code [PROMOCODE] And Earn [AMOUNT] In FREE Credit.
Each friend that applies your referral code during registration will receive [AMOUNT] in FREE credit. Upon completion of their first job, [AMOUNT] will be credited into your account.
You will be able to accumulate up to [MAX_AMOUNT] In FREE credits.
By registering, I have read and agreed to the Terms of Use and the Privacy Policy

string.name: success_order_1
string.b: Thank you for your business.\n Your job has been confirmed.

resources.string:
Next steps


(1) You will receive reminders from us through SMS and through an in-app notification the day before your appointment date

 (2) When the merchant arrives to perform your job, ask for a verification code. Go to the Job Details page, click on “VERIFY MERCHANT” and enter the passcode to start the job

 (3) After the merchant has completed the job, close the job by clicking on “COMPLETE JOB”

 (4) Rate your merchant!
Your request has not been processed because of a payment failure. Please return to the Payment Page to complete your transaction or go back to view the Merchant\'s offer.
By accepting this offer, you confirm that you have read and have agreed to be bound by the terms of the cancellation policy applicable to this particular service, as set out in the link below.

Our Concierge operates from 9:30am to 8:30pm Mondays - Friday, 9:30am to 1:30pm Saturdays & Sundays.\n\n
Outside of these hours, please email us at services@cool-find.com if you would like to leave us a message to call you back the next day.
